tooltip.displayText: Kids Favourites Filter applied. Remove this filter to see the full Menu.

info.name: Coffee Rasgulla Tiramisu
info.description:
Bengali specialty meets Italian classic! Coffee-soaked rasgullas layered with mascarpone cream topped with almond brittle and a generous dusting of cocoa powder. 
Serves 1-2 
Quantity : Approx 200 gm

info.name: Bombay's 3-Layer Chocolate Fudge - Classic
info.description: Get your box of Bombay's 3-Layer Fudge! Two layers of 70% dark chocolate peda sandwiched with peanut chikki and 55% dark chocolate ganache, topped with peanut cashew tuille.

info.name: Gulab Jamun (6pcs)
info.description: Inspired by Lemcha, our Gulab Jamun is fried in pure ghee and stuffed with pistachios and saffron and doused in sugar syrup. One portion contains 6 pcs. Enjoy within 7 days.

info.name: Gulab Jamun (6pcs)
info.description: Inspired by Lemcha, our Gulab Jamun is fried in pure ghee and stuffed with pistachios and saffron and doused in sugar syrup. One portion contains 6 pcs. Enjoy within 7 days.

info.name: Coffee Rasgulla Tiramisu
info.description:
Bengali specialty meets Italian classic! Coffee-soaked rasgullas layered with mascarpone cream topped with almond brittle and a generous dusting of cocoa powder. 
Serves 1-2 
Quantity : Approx 200 gm

info.name: Gulab Jamun (6pcs)
info.description: Inspired by Lemcha, our Gulab Jamun is fried in pure ghee and stuffed with pistachios and saffron and doused in sugar syrup. One portion contains 6 pcs. Enjoy within 7 days.

info.name: Sweet Shop Kesar Rasmalai
info.description: Our traditional Rasmalai is soaked in saffron sugar syrup and then steeped in an indulgent badam and saffron milk! One portion includes 5 pieces.

info.name: Assorted Mithai Box
info.description: A box of assorted mithai to remind you of the magic of mithai! Hand-made with love and only the best ingredients.

info.name: Kesar Shrikhand
info.description: Who doesn’t love a creamy, sweet Shrikhand? Our special Kesar Shrikhand (200g) is rich with the flavour of saffron and a delight in every bite!

info.name: Modak Medley - Box of 7 Combo
info.description: A box of assorted modaks to add to the celebrations! Hand-made with love and only the best ingredients, now in a festive box! Chocolate Hazelnut Modak, Puran Poli Modak & Carrot Halwa Modak

info.name: Modak Medley
info.description: A box of assorted modaks to add to the celebrations! Hand-made with love and only the best ingredients.Chocolate Hazelnut Modak, Puran Poli Modak & Carrot Halwa Modak

info.name: Crazy About Chocolate Gift Bag
info.description: Obsessed with chocolate? Here's the perfect hamper for you! 1 x Chocolate Butterscotch Barks (90g) + 1 x Indie Bites - 54.5% Dark Chocolate Kaju Katli + 1 x Indie Bar - Coconut Caramel Patissa

info.name: Bombay Sweet Shop Care Package with Assorted Mithai - Box of 9
info.description: The ultimate care package to put a smile on your face! This box contains - 1 x Assorted Mithai- Box of 9, 1 x Indie Bar - Coconut Patissa, 1 x Bombay Bhel Chikki Mini (45g), 1 x Super Crunch Chikki Mini (45g) and 1 x Choco Butterscotch Barks (200g)

choices.name: Peri Peri Potato Salli (90g) - Mini Pack
Tex Mex Corn Chivda (70g) - Mini Pack

info.name: The Chocolate Lover's Hamper
info.description: Our bestseller chocolatey treats for those who eat, sleep and dream of all things chocolate! This hamper comes in a box & contains - 1 x Choco Butterscotch Barks (90g), 1 x Bombay's 3-Layer Chocolate Fudge & 2 x Indie Bars

info.name: Pick-Me Up Bag
info.description: The only pick-me-up you need! Pretty in pink, this bag contains - 1 x Assorted Mithai- Box of 9, 1 x Indie Bar - Coconut Patissa and 1 x Choco Butterscotch Barks

info.name: Indie Bites - 54.5% Dark Chocolate Kaju Katli
info.description: Where chocolate meets mithai to make the ultimate indulgent treat! Kaju Katli layered with 55% dark chocolate ganache and a generous dusting of Dutch cocoa powder.

info.name: Choco Butterscotch Barks (300g) In Gift Box
info.description: A dark chocolate and butterscotch brittle loaded with crunchy toasted almonds and sea salt in a gift box.

info.name: Choco Butterscotch Barks
info.description: A happy kitchen accident, this sharp edged dark chocolate and butterscotch brittle is loaded with crunch and nostalgia - almonds and sea salt.

info.name: Bombay's 3-Layer Chocolate Fudge - Classic
info.description: Get your box of Bombay's 3-Layer Fudge! Two layers of 70% dark chocolate peda sandwiched with peanut chikki and 55% dark chocolate ganache, topped with peanut cashew tuille.

info.name: Indie Bar - Coconut Caramel Patissa
info.description:
The Indie Bar is a chocolate bar truly Indian at heart, where mithai meets chocolate! The base of our Indian chocolate bar is flaky patissa. This is then layered with a silky pepper caramel and a light coconut fluff. Each chocolate bar is then enrobed in 54% dark chocolate. 
Each pack contains 2 bars.

variantGroups.name: Choice of Indie Bar - Coconut Caramel Patissa

info.name: Chilli Cheese Bhujia
info.description: Besan Bhujia tossed in the timeless combination of chilli & cheese!

info.name: Assorted Namkeen Combo (Pack of 3)
info.description: Add some spice to your life with all things chatpata! 1 x Tex Mex Corn Chivda (70g & 200g), 1 x Chilli Cheese Bhujia (90g & 225g) & 1 x Peri Peri Potato Salli (90g &225g). Available in 2 options - 90g (Mini Packs)  and 200g (Large Packs)

info.name: Chatpata Kairi Mixture
info.description: A mixture of corn flakes, roasted peanuts, cashews, puffed rice and besan namkeen flavoured with kachi kairi!

info.name: Peri Peri Potato Salli
info.description: Our Sweet Shop All Rounder golden-fried potato salli tossed in a peri peri spice mix along with almonds, cashews and raisins.

variantGroups.name: Choice of Peri Peri Potato Salli

info.name: Tex Mex Corn Chivda
info.description: [Jain-friendly] If the classic crunchy cornflakes chivda had a Mexican cousin, this would be it. Loaded with cashew nuts, curry leaves and zingy spice, your new favourite namkeen has arrived!

variantGroups.name: Choice of Tex Mex Corn Chivda

info.name: Assorted Chikki Combo
info.description: Sugar, spice and all things nice, this combo of our Bombay Bhel Chikki and Super Crunch Chikki is a perfect treat for any time of the day!

variations.name: Bombay Bhel Chikki (45g) + Super Crunch Chikki (45g)
Bombay Bhel Chikki (90g) + Super Crunch Chikki (90g)
3 x Bombay Bhel Chikki (45g) + 3 x Super Crunch Chikki (45g) - 10% OFF - Combo Party Pack

info.name: Bombay Bhel Chikki
info.description: A mini version of our Bombay Bhel Chikki, this chikki bari is an ode to the snacking culture in India and especially one of Bombay’s most popular snacks, bhel! The crunchy, sweet and savoury elements come together in a bar packed with seeds, chakli, salli, chips, sev, gathia, nuts and bhel held together with jaggery. Hand-made with love one by one - with only the best ingredients

variations.name: Combo Pack of 3 (Bombay Bhel Chikki 45g) - 10% OFF
Combo Pack of 3 (Bombay Bhel Chikki 90g) - 10% OFF

info.name: Super Crunch Chikki
info.description: Not just a crunch, we’ve dialed it up to SUPER crunch! For every bar, we toss a bag of toasted seeds (poppy, black and white sesame, melon), puffed amaranth and rose petals into a pool of sticky jaggery.

variations.name: Combo Pack of 3 (Super Crunch Chikki 45g)  - 10% OFF
Combo Pack of 3 (Super Crunch Chikki 90g) - 10% OFF

info.name: Indian Cookies
info.description: Our gluten-free, melt-in-your-mouth nankhatais are rich in nostalgia made with rice flour, besan, ghee, and dusted with icing sugar.

info.name: Chocolate Butter Cookies
info.description: Equal parts of chocolate, butter and indulgence - our Chocolate Butter Cookies with rich cocoa, dark chocolate chips and sea-salt are the perfect after meal treat!

info.name: Assorted Cheat Sweets - Box of 3
info.description: Our range of assorted sweets made with natural sugars (jaggery, coconut sugar, dates)- Coffee Choco Barfi, Hazelnut Besan Barfi & Nutty Date Barfi

info.name: Choco Butterscotch Barks Combo
info.description: A happy kitchen accident, this sharp edged dark chocolate and butterscotch brittle is loaded with crunch and nostalgia - almonds and sea salt.

variantGroups.name: Choice of Choco Butterscotch Barks Combo

info.name: Indie Bar - Coconut Caramel Patissa - Pack of 3 - 10% OFF
info.description: A chocolate bar truly Indian at heart - where mithai meets chocolate! A flaky patissa base that is layered with silky pepper caramel and light coconut fluff. Each chocolate bar is coated in 54% dark chocolate. Each pack contains 2 bars.

info.name: Namkeen & Choco Butterscotch Barks Combo
info.description: The perfect munchies for all your sweet and savoury cravings! 1 x Choco Butterscotch Barks (90g & 200g), 1 x Tex Mex Corn Chivda (70g & 200g), 1 x Chilli Cheese Bhujia (90g & 225g) & 1 x Peri Peri Potato Salli (90g & 225g). Available in 2 options - 90g(Mini Packs) and 200g (Large Packs)

variantGroups.name: Choice of Namkeen & Choco Butterscotch Barks Combo
